definition: to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Wake up from standby possible only vian electricing key.
sentences.chinese: 待機下唯有掛機鍵可喚醒設備。

sentences.english: Please hold on. You can leave your message when you hear the beep.
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛機，當聽到滴的一聲後就可以留言了。

sentences.english: Wake up from standby possible only vian influence key.
sentences.chinese: 待機下只有掛機鍵可喚醒設備。

sentences.english: Recently fat, called a smile, face can meet key hang up.
sentences.chinese: 最近又胖了，打電話時一笑，臉蛋就能碰到掛機鍵。

sentences.english: When the update have successfully completed, hang up and reset your system.
sentences.chinese: 升級完成後即可掛機並重新啓動系統。

sentences.english: BNB hook plugin can be used directly to compile.
sentences.chinese: 泡泡堂掛機外掛，直接編譯即可使用。

sentences.english: A boat with an outboard motor.
sentences.chinese: 尾掛機船裝有舷外發動機的船。

sentences.english: Love is like missed call. It stop when you try to catch.
sentences.chinese: 愛就像來電未接，你想接的時候，對方卻掛機了。

sentences.english: We are an organised resistance movement, not an angry mob.
sentences.chinese: 如果他是一個掛機或者打錢的，他不會理解你的話。

sentences.english: Grandpa is always impatient when talking on the phone, he hangs up before I finish talking.
sentences.chinese: 打電話總是特急，我還沒說完話他就掛機了。

sentences.english: Ok. Please hold on and enter the pin number followed by the voice alert.
sentences.chinese: 好的，請不要掛機，按語音提示操作輸入密碼。

sentences.english: Last year, my family bought a hook installed in my room.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我家買了一臺掛機，安裝在我的房間。

alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
